required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: PF-06741086 Long-term Treatment in Severe Hemophilia
clinical_study.official_title: A MULTICENTER, OPEN-LABEL STUDY TO EVALUATE THE LONG-TERM SAFETY, TOLERABILITY AND EFFICACY OF SUBCUTANEOUS PF-06741086 IN SUBJECTS WITH SEVERE HEMOPHILIA

brief_summary.textblock: This study is designed to evaluate the safety, tolerability and efficacy of long-term treatment with PF-06741086 in subjects with severe hemophilia who participated in the 3-month Phase 1b/2 B7841002 study. Additionally, de novo subjects will be recruited into this study.

primary_outcome.measure: Frequency, severity and causal relationship of treatment emergent adverse events (TEAEs) and withdrawals due to TEAEs
primary_outcome.description: Treatment-related AE was any untoward medical occurrence attributed to study drug in a participant who received study drug. Serious adverse event (SAE) was an AE resulting in any of the following outcomes or deemed significant for any other reason: death; initial or prolonged inpatient hospitalization; life-threatening experience (immediate risk of dying); persistent or significant disability/incapacity; congenital anomaly.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of subjects with laboratory abnormalities
primary_outcome.description: Following parameters were analyzed for laboratory examination: hematology, serum chemistry, and urinalysis.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with changes from baseline in vital signs
primary_outcome.description: Following parameters were analyzed for vital sign examination: blood pressure, pulse rate, temperature, respiration rate.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with change from baseline in electrocardiogram (ECG) parameters
primary_outcome.description: Following parameters were analyzed for ECG examinations: QT interval (QTc), QTcF interval (Fridericia's Correction), QRS complex, PR interval, and RR interval.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of subjects with injection site reactions
primary_outcome.description: Following parameters were analyzed for injection site reaction examinations: induration, erythema, edema, rash, pruritus.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of subejct with infusion site reactions
primary_outcome.description: Following parameters were analyzed for infusion site reactions: induration, erythema, edema, rash, pruritus.

secondary_outcome.description: Bleeding episodes requiring treatment with factor replacement.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of treatments for breakthrough bleeding episodes

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Severe hemophilia A or B (Factor VIII or Factor IX activity â‰¤ 1%)
- Subjects enrolled as Factor VIII or Factor IX inhibitor patients must have a positive inhibitor test result (above the upper limit of normal) at the local laboratory and must receive a bypass agent as primary treatment for bleeding episodes.
- Episodic (on-demand) treatment regimen prior to screening
- At least 6 acute bleeding episodes during the 6-month period prior to screening
Exclusion Criteria:
- Known coronary artery, thrombotic, or ischemic disease
- Concomitant treatment with activated prothrombin complex concentrate

facility.name: UC Denver Hemophilia and Thrombosis Center
Centro de Hematologia e Hemoterapia de Campinas- Hemocentro de Campinas
Instituto Estadual de Hematologia Arthur de Siqueira Cavalcanti- HEMORIO

link.description: To obtain contact information for a study center near you, click here.

patient_data.ipd_description: Pfizer will provide access to individual de-identified participant data and related study documents (e.g. protocol, Statistical Analysis Plan (SAP), Clinical Study Report (CSR)) upon request from qualified researchers, and subject to certain criteria, conditions, and exceptions. Further details on Pfizer's data sharing criteria and process for requesting access can be found at: https://www.pfizer.com/science/clinical_trials/trial_data_and_results/data_requests.
